Keywords: Phoenix Force , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Jean Grey
Special Powers
HELLFIRE GALA: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character with the X-Men keyword attacks and the attack roll includes exactly one 5, you may replace the other die with a 5.
HIGH FASHION: TELEKINETIC FLOATING X HEADPIECE: When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword hits and a 5-5 was rolled, after resolutions give an action token to each hit character.
IMPLANTED IDEAS: Mind Control. When Jean Grey uses it, after resolutions deal a hit character damage equal to its printed damage value.
TELEPATHIC WARNING: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses.

heyodern
That three-target, 11-attack mind control is nice, but the added Implanted Ideas makes it so much much dangerous. I'm just picturing a big Tentpole watching his support hit each other, only to then have him merc one and deal himself 5. I feel like the idea team is Jean, Scott, Wolverine, Emma, Polaris, Rogue and Synch all on their second clicks, clocking in at 300 points.
